about_the_game:
Come across every kind of unsolved horrors from all around the world. They are just a door away.
INDOORS is a single-player horror escape room anthology game developed by Snova.
Made for horror fans looking for a puzzle challenge in different tension-filled maps. You can also play it in VR to take it horror to the next level.

EVERYBODY WELCOME OUR NEWEST JOURNALIST!
It’s your first day working for Indoors L.C., the best supernatural and haunted themed magazine in the world. Your task is simple, you investigate different unsolved cases from all around the world! Isn’t that exciting? Afterwards you’ll have to do some paperwork in order so we can publish the next groundbreaking article everyone will be talking about!
So sit down in your office, place the slide of your assigned case on the projector and just wait to see what happens…



YOUR FIRST CASE: THE ALSTON FAMILY DISAPPEARANCE
It’s been over 40 years since the Alston family disappeared without a trace. Case was closed after the local police department lost the case’s files.
It is now your task to investigate the Alston Manor and search for any clue of what really happened inside. Wander through the dark alleys and adventure through the mysterious rooms of the manor house solving every kind of puzzle.
It is supposed to be empty but we recommend you check your back every now and then.



FEATURES
• Designed for both keyboard/mouse & VR play.
• Procedural puzzles make every run unique, with different codes, placements and a couple
more surprises.
• Scares toggle at random, so you won’t expect the evil coming.
• Unique puzzles and situations never seen in a horror game before.
• Experience the horror escape room experience in The Manor House, with more maps
down the line.
• Tons of secrets and easter eggs, things might not be what they seem

name: INDOORS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR

short_description: All kind of unsolved horrors from all around the world are just a door away. INDOORS is a single-player horror anthology game developed by Snova where your puzzle solving abilities will take you through 7 paranormal escape rooms.
